ygData.subject: Re: 10 coin spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: I do not have the loc, but i have a description hehe. will post in a few, going to lunch hehe. ... From: Brian Pifer  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I do not have the loc, but i have a description hehe. will post in a few,
going to lunch hehe.

----- Original Message -----
From: Brian Pifer <bpifer@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 1:07 PM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] 10 coin spoiler


> From: Brian Pifer <bpifer@...>
>
> Aeramus,
> Please post the locations of the seven coins that you have found.
> If you have the loc, they would be useful also.
>
> Camai on Brell
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 10:08 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 158
>
>
> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> i have found 7 of the 10 coins now.
> the last 3 should be easy (felwithe, Kaladim, and that gnome city (forgot
> the name))
> if there are any you want to find, just e-mail the list. and i will tell
you
> where they are.
>
> Aeramus Brainblaster
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: TESCO CR <luigi@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 12:54 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 158
>
>
> > From: "TESCO CR" <luigi@...>
> >
> > As i was reading another list they mentioned the silver coins. The
> location
> > of all the coins except one are in pools of water. The one in Erudin is
in
> > the fountain and is the only one i have seen, but then again i havent
been
> > looking for them i didnt know what to do with it so it only took up
space.
> > At least now i know where to go with it, as i find them i will let the
> list
> > know where they are located.
> >
> > >
>
> >
